feed.title: health-interoperability-lab
feed.subtitle: An engaging 1-3 sentence description of your lab.

entry.title: First Post
entry.content: I had a great experience using the Lab Website Template from the Greene Lab. Very careful and thorough documentation. I had debated on whether or not to create bootstrap site but ultimately decided that the citation functionality in this template will be well worth the dependence on an external group.
entry.summary: I had a great experience using the Lab Website Template from the Greene Lab. Very careful and thorough documentation. I had debated on whether or not to create bootstrap site but ultimately decided that the citation functionality in this template will be well worth the dependence on an external group.
